posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment 快速生成和部署1$ hexo g -d 查看网站文章信息1$ hexo list post 其他命令12345$ hexo new post "name" # 生成一个新的要发布的文章$ hexo new draft "name" # 生成一个新的草稿$ hexo new page "name" # 生成一个新的页面$ hexo publish draft "name" # 将草稿移动到post 引用123456789101112引用块,文字等:{% blockquote [author[, source]] [link] [source_link_title] %}content{% endblockquote %}引用代码块:{% codeblock [title] [lang:language] [url] [link text] %}code snippet{% endcodeblock %} 图片引用正确的引用图片方式是使用下列的标签插件而不是 markdown, 通过这种方式，图片将会同时出现在文章和主页以及归档页中: 1{% asset_img example.jpg This is an example image %}
